TITLE: A verification email has been sent.
PLEASECHK: Please check the verification email in your mailbox
EXPLAIN: If you do not receive an email, please check your spam mailbox.
NOTICE1: The verification email is only valid for 24 hours from the time it was sent, and the existing verification code expires when re-sent. Be sure to check the last received email.
NOTICE2: If you do not receive the email, please check your spam folder.
